pr_title: Upgrade to Gradle 6.6 (And improve scala-concurrent muzzle/tests)

timeline.message:
Fix scala-concurrent muzzle and tests

Previously it was using the forced version so it wasn't properly validating the ranges.

timeline.bodyText: I would say that anything below 2.10 is ancient (as in 2010-2013) and shouldn't be checked against. No akka or play version that we are even remotely interested in uses anything older than scala 2.10.
timeline.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: Well, since we "assert inverse" muzzle will fail.  I don't see a problem leaving the range greater but unit testing starting with what we want to support.
replies.author: tylerbenson
